response:
"wovon können wir wirklich sicher sein, wenn unser persönliches daten von unternehmen und regierungen gesammelt und verkauft wird? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

(translation: "what can we really be sure of when our personal data is collected and sold by companies and governments? #dataprotection #privacy #security")

this post critically examines the topic of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it raises a question about the uncertainty of personal data security, especially in the context of companies and governments collecting and selling such data. the hashtags used in the post help to categorize it under relevant topics, making it discoverable by users interested in data privacy and security.
